org.mmbase.bridge.util

Class ChangedNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mmbase.bridge.util.NodeWrapper
      • org.mmbase.bridge.util.ChangedNode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<Node>, Node

    public class ChangedNode
extends NodeWrapper
    A nodewrapper in which fields are explicitely marked as 'changed' (even though they may actually not be).
    Since:
    MMBase-1.9.2
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Michiel Meeuwissen
